one day at Auradon prep, Audrey was sitting in history class board out of her mind, she thought history class was a waste of time and that everyone in the kingdom knows the stories, Audrey decided to Just glance around the room since the teacher started talking about her mother's story and Audrey thought she knew enough about that since she is sleeping beauty's daughter.

Audrey looked in front of her and noticed her rival Mal who seemed to be really focused on the lesson. she and Mal might have played nice at Ben's coronation after Mal defeated her own mother but Audrey didn't really consider Mal a friend but more of a rival.

then Audrey noticed a slip of pink at the bottom of her vision on Mal. Audrey then adjusted herself to get a better look and noticed Mal was wearing a pair of pink panties that had her name written on the waistband, Mal then leaned forward exposing more of her underwear and to Audrey's shock the image on the panties was her mother sleeping beauty.

once Audrey got over the shock of the daughter of Maleficent wearing sleeping beauty themed underwear, Audrey...

having a bit of a smirk on her face, Audrey whispered into Mal's ear.

Audrey(whispering): "I can get my mom to autograph those cute little panties for you if you want."

Mal went stiff for a moment, she was mentally cursing herself for forgetting to wear a belt at first, then she thought for a moment, she secretly idolized sleeping beauty and really wanted to meet the woman she considered her personal hero, maybe even apologize to her on her mother's behalf.

Mal then... privately

Audrey thought about it for a moment, thinking about what embarrassing thing to have Mal do. then an idea popped in her head.

Audrey: "okay, what you are going to do is expose your cute little panties to everyone in the school".

Mal was caught off guard by this.

Mal: "what, expose my underwear to the public?"

Audrey: "what better way to show how much you idolize my mother than to show off those sleeping beauty themed panties? you're not on the isle anymore so you have no reason to hide the fact that my mother is your personal hero. all you have to do is drop your pants to your feet, I get everyone's attention and then say how much you idolize sleeping beauty while everyone can see your panties."

info.brief_description: Choose an Universe then alter it
info.description:
You have been granted unlimited powers but before you can do anything you need to do two things

1) Choose an Universe to enter
2) Decide if you change a character or situation/episode

The Rules at this time are...
You can do anything you want except vore,
Don’t get to descriptive with any sex scenes
&
All chapters must have at least one option that is
Something else or Start a new
